name: ConnecticutPublicRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Connecticut Public Radio”
”Alexa, ask Connecticut Public Radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connecticut public radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to Connecticut Public Radio (WNPR) live on your Alexa devices!

To begin listening, enable this skill and say "Alexa, play Connecticut Public Radio."

You can also say "Alexa, ask Connecticut Public Radio what's playing" to get the name of the current program playing.
